<script type="text/javascript">var _ndnq = _ndnq || []; _ndnq.push(['embed']);</script>

<p>CHARLESTON, W.Va. -- Gauley River Public Service District has issued a boil-water advisory for Brownsville, Alta, Belva, Dixie, Bentree, Bell Creek, Mount Olive, Beech Glen, Swiss, Little Elk, Twenty Mile, Vaughan, Lyonsville, Line Creek and Drennen. The advisory was issued because of a problem that occurred at the Kanawha Falls Water Treatment Plant.The Pineville Municipal Water Works has issued a boil-water advisory for the Rolling Hills area. The advisory was issued following a loss of water pressure.Customers in those areas should boil their water for at least one full minute prior to use until further notice.The Raleigh County Public Service District has lifted the boil-water advisories for the Clear Creek Water and Elgeria Road water systems.</p><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"><div class="tncms-block" id="tncms-block-608361">

Lowellville issues boil-water advisory until Friday afternoon

  • |
  • Print
Tweet

Published: Thu, January 31, 2013 @ 5:30 p.m.

LOWELLVILLE — The Aqua Ohio Water Co. announced the Village of Lowellville is on a precautionary boil-water advisory from today until 4 p.m. Friday.

A contractor inadvertently struck a water main that supplies water in the village.

Residents are advised to bring water to a rolling boil for three to five minutes if it will be used for drinking or ingestion. Call 877-987-2782 for information.

Boil Water Advisory in Suffield Canceled

    NEWSLETTERS

    Receive the latest local updates in your inbox

    Privacy policy | More Newsletters

    The precautionary boil water advisory has been cancelled for Connecticut Water customers in Suffield.

    The boil water advisory was issued because of water main break on Route 190 near Route 159.

    All Suffield customers can drink their tap water and use for all other purposes without taking any precautions.

    According to Connecticut Water, samples were tested in a state certified laboratory and the laboratory has confirmed that the water is safe to drink.

    About 1,000 customers were asked to boil their water.

    The following streets were affected:

    • Alewife Lane
    • Burbank Ave.
    • Canal Road
    • Catherine Lane
    • Cohoe Lane

    • Cowan St.

            var bloxServiceVerified = $.cookie('tncms-services-verified');

                var bloxServiceIDs = [];
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(5009);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(5605);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4655);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4978);
                
                    bloxServiceIDs.push(4656);

                if (__tnt.user.services){
                    var bloxUserServiceIDs = __tnt.user.services.replace('%2C',',').split(',');
                    $.each(bloxUserServiceIDs, function(index, value){
                        var serviceID = parseInt(value);
                        if( serviceID != 0 ){
                            if( $.inArray(serviceID, bloxServiceIDs) > -1 ){
                                bloxHasSubscription = true;
                                return false;
                            }
                        }else{
                            bloxHasSubscription = true;
                            return false;
                        }
                    });
                }
            /* service has been whitelisted */
            } else {
                bloxHasSubscription = true;
            }

            /* check for whitelists once per day */
            if( !bloxHasSubscription && !bloxServiceVerified && typeof userWhiteList != 'undefined' && $.isArray(userWhiteList) ) {
                $.getJSON("http://www.nwitimes.com/_services/v1/client_ip_info",function(data){
                    /* create a range */
                    var dataRange = data.ip.split('.');
                    dataRange = dataRange[0]+'.'+dataRange[1]+'.'+dataRange[2];
                    if( jQuery.inArray(data.ip, userWhiteList) > -1 || jQuery.inArray(dataRange, userWhiteList) > -1 ){
                        /* white list machine */
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 1, { path:'/' });

                        bloxHasSubscription = true;
                    } else {
                        $.cookie('tncms-service-validated', 0, { path:'/', expires:1 });
                        
                        __tnt.metering.check();
                    }
                });

            /* no access */
            }else if( !bloxHasSubscription ){
                __tnt.metering.check();
            }
            
            if(bloxHasSubscription){
                $('.subscriber-only.encrypted-content').each(function(){
                    $(this).html(tncms.unscramble($(this).text()));
                    $(this).show();
                });
                $('.subscriber-hide').show();
            }

            // show main content div
            $('#site-container').show();

            // hide loading spinner
            $('.subscriber-load').hide();
        });

<div class="caption-inner-460fdbea-ee75-54da-9fbe-546bc0548e71-photo-modal collapse in"><div class="caption-text"><div class="subscriber-preview"><p>Lake Station water technician Harry Heath uses a metal detector Thursday morning on 21st place at Randolph to locate a water shut off valve as he and other city works try to isolate a break that occurred one block north affecting water flow to residences throughout the city.</p>

<div class="asset-content p402_premium subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>LAKE STATION | The water problems in Lake Station surfaced for Quinton Bolton first thing Thursday morning after he got out of bed.</p></div><div class="subscriber-preview"><p>"I couldn't flush my toilet," Bolton said.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Bolton's house in the 3400 block of East 20th Place is a short distance from a water main break that occurred around midnight affecting most of the city and eventually closing several schools, officials said.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/nwitimes.com/news/local/lake/lake-station" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-top, atf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-top-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>On Thursday night, Mayor Keith Soderquist said repairs were complete to the broken main and everyone was back on line.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>However, he said, there will be a general boil water advisory for Lake Station residents using city water through the weekend as officials await test results.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Soderquist said Bolton, his neighbors, and some businesses off Interstate 80/94, were without water while valves were closed and repairs were under way.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>The break impacted all customers served by Lake Station city water. Many reported low pressure in water lines.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>As a precaution, Lake Station issued a mandatory three day water boil for residents and businesses who were without water.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>The water is safe for bathing and washing dishes at high temperatures or on the sanitize cycle.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center "><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/nwitimes.com/news/local/lake/lake-station" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-inline-video, stf" data-dfp-size="[4,1]" data-lazy="true" id="fixed-inline-video" style="min-height:1px; min-width:4px;"></div></div>
<div class="subscriber-only"><p>The initial break occurred just north of Edison Junior/Senior High School. It forced the closure of that school as well as Bailey Elementary School.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Those schools will reopen today, Soderquist said.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Earlier Thursday, Bolton bought five cases of bottled water.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/nwitimes.com/news/local/lake/lake-station" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-middle, stf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-middle-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_middle"></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>"This same thing happened about 18 years ago," Bolton said.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>City workers Ed Sable, Jerry Cafin and Dwayne Polarek had managed to stop the water spouting from a 6-inch broken water main at the eastern end of East 20th Place.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Sable said workers were trying to determine the entire extent of the problems.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>"There could be problems further down the line as well. This is such an old system," he said.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>A second water main break, near Huntington Street and Central Avenue, was also discovered and repaired by workers, Soderquist said.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Soderquist said the break at 20th Place is believed to have been caused by the main expanding and contracting with the warm weather earlier this week and sharp drops in temperature Wednesday into Thursday.</p></div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"><div class="tncms-block" id="tncms-block-1369863"><section class="block emphasis-h3 dark " id="block-1369863">
<div class="clearfix">
<div class="block-title title-1369863 ">

<a href="http://www.nwitimes.com/subscribenow/?utm_source=direct-link&utm_medium=instory&utm_campaign=subscribenow&utm_term=" target="_blank">
                
                Subscribe to The Times

</h3>
</div>

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#tncms-region-asset_side_sticky');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="asset_side_sticky-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 80;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 80) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#site-footer-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 80);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

<div class="infinity-summary-container hidden-print" id="infinite-container">
<div data-next-url="http://www.nwitimes.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=460fdbea-ee75-54da-9fbe-546bc0548e71&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube" id="infinite-more">
<i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i>
</div>
</div>
<script>
        
            var bFoundOrigin = true;
            var sOriginID = null;
        
        var sOriginURL = scrubURL('http://www.nwitimes.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=460fdbea-ee75-54da-9fbe-546bc0548e71&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube'); // original url scrubbed for preview
        var sFirstID = null;
        var bFirstRun = true;
        var bShowAd = true;
        var bInfiniStop = false;

        function populateInfinitySet(sURL) {
            sURL = scrubURL(sURL);

            // Until the origin paramter for cms.search.mlt functions, we have to start/stop the looping on our own
            // This will require not displaying any assets until we hit oAsset.
            // Then we loop through and display until we've been through everything up to our origin

            $.ajax(sURL).then(function(oResponse, sStatus, oXHR) {

                var sNextUrl = null;

                if (typeof oResponse.next_url == 'undefined') {
                    // URL supplied is no good. Revert to original URL
                    sNextUrl = sOriginURL;
                } else {
                    sNextUrl = scrubURL(oResponse.next_url);
                }

                // Manage response
                if (typeof oResponse.assets != 'undefined' && oResponse.assets.length > 0) {
                    
                    // Remove old more data
                    $("#infinite-more").remove();

                    
                    // Build infinity set
                    $.each(oResponse.assets, function(index) {
                            if (index == 1 && sOriginID == null) {
                                sOriginID = oResponse.assets[0].id;
                            }
                        // Display assets once origin is found
                        if (bFoundOrigin == true) {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                bInfiniStop = true;
                                sNextUrl = null;
                                $("#infinite-more").remove();
                                
                            } else if (bInfiniStop == false && this.id != '460fdbea-ee75-54da-9fbe-546bc0548e71') {
                                // Display asset
                                var sHTML = '';
                                if (this.content) {
                                    sHTML += '<div class="infinite-item original row"><div class="col-md-8">' + this.content + '</div><div class="col-md-4 text-center">';
                                    if (bShowAd == true) {
                                        // Show advertisement
                                        sHTML += '<div class="infinity-ad empty"></div>'
                                        bShowAd = false;
                                    } else {
                                        bShowAd = true;
                                    }
                                    sHTML += '</div></div><hr>';
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                // Origin found. Begin displaying assets
                                bFoundOrigin = true;
                            } else {
                                // Origin found is false. Skip asset
                                // Fail-safe in case origin is not present in set. This can be removed when origin is fixed.
                                if (bFirstRun == true) {
                                    // Stored first id
                                    sFirstID = this.id;
                                    bFirstRun = false;
                                } else if (this.id == sFirstID) {
                                    // We've started again. Force origin
                                    sOriginID = sFirstID;
                                    bFoundOrigin = true;
                                } // end Fail-safe
                            }
                        }
                        // Append infinity set to container
                        $("#infinite-container").append(sHTML);
                    });

                    // Include block_id on newly added list items
                    $('#infinite-container .infinite-item.original').each(function() {
                        var sHref = scrubURL($(this).find(".card-headline a").attr("href"));
                        
                        // Add to image and headlines links
                        $(this).removeClass('original')
                            .find(".card-headline a, .image a")
                            .attr("href", sHref + "#tncms-source=infinity-scroll-summary-siderail-latest");
                    });

                    // Check next URL
                    if (sNextUrl) {
                        // if origin hasn't been found yet and we hit next_url. Trigger the set to pull in again.
                        if (bFoundOrigin == false) {
                            // No origin yet. Call the populate function
                            populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                        } else {
                            // Append sNextUrl to infinity set
                            $("#infinite-container").append('<div id="infinite-more" data-next-url="' + sNextUrl + '"><i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i></div>');
                        }
                    }
                    
                        // Ad waypoint and handler to insert ads next to summary
                        $('.infinity-ad.empty').waypoint({
                            offset: '80%',
                            handler: function(direction) {
                                // Kill waypoint
                                this.destroy();
                                $(this.element).removeClass('empty');
                                // Create and append ad iframe. Make sure this occurs only once
                                var newIframe = infinityAd();
                                if($(this.element).children().length <= 0) {
                                    $(this.element).append(newIframe);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    
                    // Refresh waypoints
                    Waypoint.refreshAll();
                } else {
                    // Empty asset set returned. Go back in for a real set
                    populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                }
            });
        }

        // Infinite waypoint
        var waypoint = new Waypoint({
            element: document.getElementById('infinite-container'),
            handler: function(direction) {
                if (direction == 'down') {
                    if (bInfiniStop == true) {                        
                        // FINISHED. Kill the waypoint
                        this.destroy();
                    } else {
                        // Log waypoint hit event
                        __tnt.trackEvent({'category':'infinity-scroll','action':'request', 'label':'assets requested', 'value': true});
                        var nextURL =  $('#infinite-more').data('next-url');
                        populateInfinitySet($('#infinite-more').data('next-url'));
                    }
                }
            },
            offset: 'bottom-in-view'
        });

        // Infinity ad
        function infinityAd() {
            var newIframe = document.createElement('iframe');
            newIframe.scrolling = 'no';
            newIframe.src = 'http://www.nwitimes.com/tncms/block/1429668/?disableTNStatsTracker=1';
            return newIframe;
        }
        // Rewrite URL to for preview
        function scrubURL(sURL) {
            if (typeof sURL != 'undefined'){
                return sURL;
            }
        }
    </script>

City of San Augustine issues boil water notice

SAN AUGUSTINE, TX (KTRE) -

The City of San Augustine has issued a boil water notice for all of its water customers.

"This advisory will remain in effect until the City of San Augustine is confident there is no longer a public health concern," a press release stated. "We will provide the next update as soon as the permanent repair has been made, and the water has been tested and approved by the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality for human consumption.

Customers should bring water to a rolling boil for three minutes, and allow it to cool before using it.

San Augustine water customers should store cooled, boiled water or bottled water for: drinking, brushing teeth, preparing food and baby formula, making ice, and pets. Even though the City of San Augustine water is not approved for drinking unless it is boiled, it has been treated and is approved for bathing and washing clothes.

Boil-water advisory issued for United Water Pennsylvania customers in Mechanicsburg area

Print Email
Joe Elias | jelias@pennlive.com By Joe Elias | jelias@pennlive.com The Patriot-News
Email the author | Follow on Twitter
on January 30, 2013 at 7:01 AM, updated January 30, 2013 at 7:42 AM
comments

United Water Pennsylvania has issued a boil water advisory for customers living in the borough of Mechanicsburg and Hampden, Silver Spring, Lower Allen, Upper Allen and Monroe townships in Cumberland County as well as Monaghan Township in York County.

The company said the advisory was issued because of low chlorine levels in the Mechanicsburg-area system.

Boiled or bottled water should be used for drinking, making ice, brushing teeth, washing dishes, and food preparation until further notice. Boiling the water kills bacteria and other organisms in the water, the company said.

Robert Manbeck, a spokesman for the water company, said the advisory does not effect the Center Square and Grantham areas of Upper Allen Township.

United Water said it will be providing further information to customers by means of a rapid alert phone call.

Boil Water Advisory in Suffield Canceled

    NEWSLETTERS

    Receive the latest local updates in your inbox

    Privacy policy | More Newsletters

    The precautionary boil water advisory has been cancelled for Connecticut Water customers in Suffield.

    The boil water advisory was issued because of water main break on Route 190 near Route 159.

    All Suffield customers can drink their tap water and use for all other purposes without taking any precautions.

    According to Connecticut Water, samples were tested in a state certified laboratory and the laboratory has confirmed that the water is safe to drink.

    About 1,000 customers were asked to boil their water.

    The following streets were affected:

    • Alewife Lane
    • Burbank Ave.
    • Canal Road
    • Catherine Lane
    • Cohoe Lane
    • Countryside Lane
    • Cowan St.
    • Deep Brook Harbor
    • Douglas St.

    • E Bass Lane
    • E Grayling Lane

    • Pebblestone Circle

    • Primrose Lane
    • Rawlins Brook Road
    • River Blvd.
    • River View Terrace

    • Salmon Way

    • Shad Row
    • Suffield Meadow Drive
    • Suffield Meadow Extension

    • Thompsonville Road
    • Thrall Ave.
    • Valley View Drive
    • W Bass Lane
    • W Grayling Lane
    • Williams Circle
    • Woodland Terrace
    • Woodworth St.

                    var clearFyreAuthCreds = function() {
                        var yesterday = new Date();
                        yesterday.setTime(yesterday.getTime() + ( - 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                        document.cookie = 'backplane-channel' + '=; expires=' + yesterday.toUTCString() + '; path=/';
                        localStorage.removeItem('fyre-auth');
                    };
                    var pingToPull = function(jrtoken) {
                        var syncEndpoint = 'http://coxtv.fyre.co/api/v1.1/private/capture/profile_updated/?jrtoken=' + jrtoken;
                        $.get(syncEndpoint, function(data) {
                            if (data && data.code === 202) {
                                console.log('Syncing livefyre with janrain...');
                            } else {
                                console.error(data);
                            }
                        });
                    };
                    var authDelegate = {
                        login: function(finishLogin) {
                            var successCallback = function(data) {
                                janrain.events.onCaptureLoginSuccess.removeHandler(successCallback);
                                pingToPull(data.accessToken);
                                finishLogin(data);
                            };
                            var failCallback = function() {
                                if (!janrain.capture.ui.hasActiveSession()) {
                                    clearFyreAuthCreds();
                                }
                            };
                            var logoutCallback = function() {
                                auth.logout();
                            };

                            janrain.events.onCaptureLoginSuccess.addHandler(successCallback);
                            janrain.events.onCaptureSessionEnded.addHandler(logoutCallback);
                            janrain.capture.ui.renderScreen('signIn');
                            window.Backplane.expectMessages('identity/login');
                            janrain.events.onCaptureLoginFailed.addHandler(failCallback);
                        },
                        logout: function(finishLogout) {
                            clearFyreAuthCreds();
                            Backplane.resetCookieChannel();
                            janrain.capture.ui.endCaptureSession();
                            finishLogout();
                        },
                        editProfile: function(user) {
                            window.open('/edit-profile');
                        },
                        viewProfile: function(user) {
                            window.open('/edit-profile');
                        }
                    };

                    window.Livefyre.require(['auth', 'backplane-auth-plugin#0'], function(auth, backplanePluginFactory) {
                        auth.plugin(backplanePluginFactory('coxtv.fyre.co'));
                        auth.delegate(authDelegate);
                    });
                } else {
                    setTimeout(initLivefyreAuth, 500);
                }
            };
            initLivefyreAuth();

            //Make sure logout from livefyre and janrain
            $('#captureSignOutLink').on('click', function() {

<!-- end: HEADLINE LIST (HOMESTREAM) -->
</div>
<script>
(function($) {
    var NavigationHomestream = function(config) {
        this.init(config);
    };
    
    var proto = NavigationHomestream.prototype,
        jqHtml = $("html, body"),
        jqNeedsScrollPadding = $('body, #header'),
        scrollbarWidth;
    
    proto.init = function(config) {
        var me = this;
        
        me.isOpen = false;
        me.loadedCount = 0;
        me.articles = [];
        me.loadedArticles = {};
        me.lastViewTime = 0;
        me.lastRefreshTime = 0;
        me.unreadCount = 0;
        me.interval = config.interval;
        me.interstitialAdConfig = config.interstitialAdConfig;
        me.adCount = 0;
        me.adInterval = config.adInterval;
        /*me.articles = [];
        try {
            if (typeof config.articles === 'object' && config.articles.length > 0) {
                me.articles = config.articles;
            }
        } catch(e) { console.error(e); }*/
    };

    proto.populateLastViewTime = function() {
        var me = nh;
        try {
            var lastViewTimeCookie = parseInt(getCookie('homestreamLastViewTime'));
            me.lastViewTime = lastViewTimeCookie.toString().length === 13 ? lastViewTimeCookie : 0;
        } catch(e) {}
    };

    /**
     * Load next 10 articles when user scrolls/clicks to view articles
     */
    proto.loadNextArticles = function() {
        var me = nh, start = 0;

        if (me.loadedCount > 0) {
            start = me.loadedCount - 1;
        }
        if (me.articles.length > 0 && me.articles.length > start) {
            me.appendArticles(me.articles.slice(start, start + 10));
        }
    };

    /**
     * Refresh article list every X minutes
     */
    proto.refresh = function() {
        var me = nh;
        me.findArticles(me.syncStates);
    };

    proto.syncStates = function(result) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;

        me.populateLastViewTime();
        if (typeof result === 'object' && result.length > 0) {
            me.lastRefreshTime = new Date().getTime();
            me.syncUnreadCount(result);
            me.syncList(result);
        }
        me._scanForAdContainers();
        me.loadAds();
    };

    proto.syncUnreadCount = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;

        me.unreadCount = 0;
        if (me.lastViewTime <= 0) {
            me.unreadCount = articles.length;
        } else {
            $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
                if (item.timestamp > me.lastViewTime) {
                    me.unreadCount++;
                } else {
                    return false;
                }
            });
        }

        // Sync up UI: unreadCount / article list
        me.setUnreadCountText();
    };
    
    proto.setUnreadCountText = function() {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
        
        if (me.unreadCount > 0) {
            if (me.unreadCount > 99) {
                UI.counter.text("99+");
            } else {
                UI.counter.text(me.unreadCount);
            }
            UI.counter.addClass('counter');
            UI.listCount.text('(' + me.unreadCount + ' new stories)');
        } else {
            UI.counter.removeClass('counter');
            UI.counter.text('');
            UI.listCount.text('');
        }
    };
    
    proto.syncList = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
        
        // Update timestamp of existing list
        UI.list.find('li').each(function() {
            var articleId = $(this).attr('articleId');
            if (articleId && me.loadedArticles[articleId]) {
                date = new Date(me.loadedArticles[articleId].timestamp);
                $(this).find('time').text(getTimeDiff(date));
            }
        });
        
        // If loaded count > 0, then prepend the new created items to the top
        if (me.loadedCount > 0) {
            var latestArticle = me.articles[0],
                prependItems = [];
            $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
                if (item.timestamp <= latestArticle.timestamp) {
                    if (idx > 0) {
                        prependItems = articles.slice(0, idx);
                        me.articles = prependItems.concat(me.articles);
                    }
                    return false;
                }
            });
            if (prependItems.length > 0) {
                me.prependArticles(prependItems.reverse());
            }
        // Else load the all articles
        } else {
            me.loadedCount = 0;
            me.appendArticles(articles);
        }
    };
    
    proto.prependArticles = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
        
        $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
            // Remove the element if it's already in the list
            if (me.loadedArticles[item.articleId]) {
                UI.list.find('[articleId="'+item.articleId+'"]').remove();
            } else {
                me.loadedCount++;
                me.adCount++;
            }
            if (me.adInterval > 0 && me.adCount > me.adInterval) {
                me.adCount = 1;
                me.inserInterstitialAd();
            }
            UI.list.prepend(me.createMediaElement(item));
            me.loadedArticles[item.articleId] = item;
        });
    };
    
    proto.appendArticles = function(articles) {
        var me = nh, UI = nh.UI;
    
        $.each(articles, function(idx, item) {
            if (!me.loadedArticles[item.articleId]) {
                UI.list.append(me.createMediaElement(item));
                me.loadedArticles[item.articleId] = item;
                me.loadedCount++;
            }
        });
    };
    
    proto.findArticles = function(callback) {
        var me = nh;
        
        try {
            $.ajax({
                type: 'GET',
                url: '/cox-customization-portlet/restful/homestream/find_articles',
                data: {
                    "source": "C_HOMESTREAM_SOURCE_AUTOFLOW",
                    "companyId": 10155,
                    "groupId": 12333162
                },
                success: function(result) {
                    try {
                        if (result.storyResultList) {
                            callback(result.storyResultList);
                        }
                    } catch(e) {
                        console.error(e);
                    }
                },
                error: function(e) {
                    console.error(e);
                }
            });
        } catch(e) { console.error(e); }
    };

    proto.createMediaElement = function(article) {
        var me = nh,
            date = new Date(article.timestamp),
            read = date.getTime() < me.lastViewTime ? 'read' : '';
        return '<li class="' + read + '" articleId="' + article.articleId + '"><a href="' + article.url + '?utm_source=homestream&utm_medium=site_navigation&utm_campaign=homestream_click' + '">' +
                 '<h4>' + article.headline + getIcon(article.mediaType) + '</h4>' +
                 '<time>' + getTimeDiff(date) + '</time>' +
               '</a></li>';
    };

    var getIcon = function(mediaType) {
        var ICON = { 'gallery': 'icon-gallery-inline', 'video': 'ep-icon-play', 'livestream': 'ep-icon-play' };
        return ICON[mediaType] ? ' <i class="' + ICON[mediaType] + '"></i>' : '';
    };

    var getTimeDiff = function(date) {
        var now = new Date(),
            diff = now - date,
            diffMinute = Math.ceil(diff/(60*1000));

        if (diffMinute < 60) {
            return diffMinute + (diffMinute <= 1 ? ' minute ago' : ' minutes ago');
        } else {
            var diffHour = Math.round(diff/(60*60*1000));
            if (diffHour < 24) {
                return diffHour + (diffHour <= 1 ? ' hour ago' : ' hours ago');
            } else {
                // get date string
                var dateStr = '',
                    first = new Date(date.getYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate()),
                    second = new Date(now.getYear(), now.getMonth(), now.getDate()),
                    dateDiff = Math.ceil((second-first)/(1000*60*60*24));
                if (dateDiff < 7 && date.getDay() < now.getDay()) {
                    var DAYINWEEK = ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', ' Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'],
                        dayStr = (dateDiff === 1 ? 'Yesterday' : DAYINWEEK[date.getDay()]) + ' at',
                        time = date.toLocaleTimeString().split(' ')[0].split(':'),
                        amPM = date.toLocaleTimeString().split(' ')[1],
                        timeStr = time[0] + ':' + time[1] + ' ' + amPM;
                    return dayStr + ' ' + timeStr;
                } else {
                    return dateDiff + ' days ago';
                }
            }
        }
    };
    
    proto.inserInterstitialAd = function() {
        var me = nh, UI = me.UI;
        
        var jqAdRow = $("<li class='with-ad'><div class='portlet-boundary'>" +
                 "<section class='mod-wrapper mod-ad ad-320 slot-rendered' data-ad-json='" + me.interstitialAdConfig + "'>" +
                 "</section></div></div></li>"),
        	jqAd = jqAdRow.find('.mod-ad');

        UI.list.prepend( jqAdRow );
        me._addWaitingAd( jqAd.get(0) );

        me.loadAds();
    };
    
    proto.loadAds = function() {
        var me = nh, UI = me.UI;
        
        if( me.isOpen && UI.waitingAds.length ) {
            // Make refresh call so waypoint can check itself in viewport
            $.each(UI.waitingAds, function(idx, adWatcher){
				adWatcher.refresh();
            });
        }
    };

    var setCookie = function(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
        var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
        document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
    };

    var getCookie = function(cname) {
        var name = cname + "=";
        var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
        var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
        for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
            var c = ca[i];
            while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                c = c.substring(1);
            }
            if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
                return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
            }
        }
        return "";
    };

    proto.setupUI = function() {
        var me = this;
        
        me.UI = me.UI || {};        
        me.UI.instance = $('#NavigationHomestream_MOD-NAVIGATION_HOMESTREAM_78369' + '.homestream-header');
        me.UI.icon = me.UI.instance.find('.publish-notification');
        me.UI.counter = me.UI.icon.find('span');
        me.UI.homestream = me.UI.instance.find('.homestream');
        me.UI.listCount = me.UI.homestream.find('span.count');
        me.UI.listContainer = me.UI.homestream.children('div.mod-body');
        me.UI.list = me.UI.listContainer.find('ul.list.media');
        me.UI.loader = me.UI.homestream.find('div.loader');
        me.UI.close = me.UI.homestream.find('.homestream-close');
        me.UI.overlay = me.UI.instance.find('.overlay-homestream');
        me.UI.sponsoredAd = me.UI.homestream.find('.mod-header .sponsored');

        me.UI.waitingAds = []; // array of AdWatchers with ad containers waiting to be rendered
        me._scanForAdContainers();
        
        var jqDoc = $(document);
        me.UI.touchImmovable = me.UI.overlay;
        me.UI.clickClosable = jqDoc;
        jqDoc.ready(function(){
            // wait for the rest to get added to DOM
            me.UI.touchImmovable = me.UI.touchImmovable.add('#mobile-header').add('.smart-app-banner').add('#header .off-canvas-menu');
            me.UI.clickClosable = me.UI.clickClosable.add('#toggle-menu');
        });
    };

    proto._scanForAdContainers = function(){
		var me = nh;
    	me.UI.list.find('.with-ad section.mod-ad.ad-320').not('.ad-watching').each(function(idx, ad){
            if( !$(ad).find('.ep-ad-slot').length ){
                me._addWaitingAd( ad );
            }
        });
    };

    proto._addWaitingAd = function( modAd ){
        var me = nh;
        $(modAd).addClass('ad-watching');

        $(document).ready(function(){  // wait for DOM ready since Waypoints code is in theme footer
            
            var onAdVisible = function(adWatcher){
                var jqAd = $( adWatcher.modAd ),
                    adJsonConfig = jqAd.data('ad-json');

                if (!jqAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').length && adJsonConfig && adJsonConfig.targetting && adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot.length) {
                    me.UI.waitingAds.splice($.inArray(adWatcher, me.UI.waitingAds), 1); //remove from array
                    adWatcher.destroy();
                    
                    EP.Utils.AdUtils.createIncrementingContent(adJsonConfig, jqAd, "append");
                    jqAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').attr('name', adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot[0]);
                }
            };
            
            var adWatcher = new AdWatcher(modAd, me.UI.listContainer, onAdVisible);
            me.UI.waitingAds.push( adWatcher );
            if( me.isOpen ){
                adWatcher.enable();
            }
            
        });
    };

    proto.setEventListener = function() {
        var me = this, UI = this.UI;
        
        // Set events and listener and interactions
        UI.icon.live('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            
            me.isOpen ? me.close() : me.open();
        });
        
        var clickClose = function(e){
            e.preventDefault();

            me.close();
        };
        UI.close.live('click', clickClose);
        UI.overlay.click(clickClose);
        /*UI.listContainer.on('scroll', function() {
            var scrollTop = $(this).scrollTop();
            if (scrollTop + $(this).innerHeight() >= this.scrollHeight) {
                me.loadNextArticles();
            }
        });*/
    };
    
    proto.setInitStates = function() {
        var me = this, UI = this.UI;
        
        me.unreadCount = 0;
        me.populateLastViewTime();
        me.lastRefreshTime = new Date().getTime();
        UI.list.find('li').each(function(idx, item) {
            if (!$(item).attr('class') || $(item).attr('class').indexOf('with-ad') < 0) {
                var timestamp = 0;
            
                try {
                    var time = $(item).find('time'),
                        timestamp = parseInt(time.attr('timestamp')),
                        date = new Date(timestamp);
                        
                    time.text(getTimeDiff(date));
                    if (me.lastViewTime < timestamp) {
                        me.unreadCount++;
                    } else {
                        $(item).addClass('read');
                    }
                } catch(e) {}
                
                // Add to loaded article list
                var articleId = $(item).attr('articleId'),
                    url = $(item).find('a').attr('href'),
                    article = { 'articleId': articleId, 'url': url, 'timestamp': timestamp };
                me.loadedCount++;
                me.articles.push(article);
                me.loadedArticles[articleId] = article;
            } else if (me.adInterval > 0 && me.adCount <= 0) {
                me.adCount = idx;
            }
        });
        
        me.setUnreadCountText();
    };
    
    proto.start = function() {
        var me = this;
        
        me.setupUI();
        me.setInitStates();
        me.setEventListener();
        if (me.interval > 0) {
            setInterval(me.refresh, me.interval);
        }
    };

    proto.resetStates = function() {
        var me = this,
            UI = this.UI;

        me.unreadCount = 0;
        UI.counter.text('');
        UI.counter.removeClass('counter');
        
        var viewTime = me.lastRefreshTime > 0 ? me.lastRefreshTime : new Date().getTime();
        setCookie("homestreamLastViewTime", viewTime, 5);
    };

    proto.open = function() {
        var me = this,
            UI = this.UI;
        
        if( !me.isOpen ){
            scrollbarWidth = (typeof scrollbarWidth === 'undefined') ? measureScrollbar() : scrollbarWidth;

            UI.icon.addClass('open');
            UI.homestream.stop(true).slideDown();
            jqHtml.addClass('noscroll');
            jqNeedsScrollPadding.css('padding-right', scrollbarWidth+'px');
            
            // Scroll to top of the list when open it
            UI.listContainer.scrollTo(0);
            
            // Reset homestream state only when closing the list
            //me.resetStates();
            
            // Load sponsored AD when dropdown list opens for the first time
            if (!UI.sponsoredAd || !UI.sponsoredAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').length) {
                var adJsonConfig = UI.sponsoredAd.data('ad-json');
                if (adJsonConfig && adJsonConfig.targetting && adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot.length) {
                    EP.Utils.AdUtils.createIncrementingContent(adJsonConfig, UI.sponsoredAd, "append");
                    UI.sponsoredAd.find('.ep-ad-slot').attr('name', adJsonConfig.targetting.ad_slot[0]);
                }
            }
            
            // clicking off closes it
            me._closeHandler = function(e){
                var target = e.target,
                    instance = UI.instance.get(0),
                    // check if click came from itself or within
                    clickedInside = target && (target===instance || $.contains(instance, target));
                if( !clickedInside ){
                   me.close();
                }
            };
            // to prevent body scrolling on IOS touch
            me._moveHandler = function(e){
                e.preventDefault();
                e.stopImmediatePropagation();
                e.stopPropagation();
            };
            UI.clickClosable.bind('click', me._closeHandler);
            UI.touchImmovable.bind('touchmove', me._moveHandler);
            me.isOpen = true;

            $.each(UI.waitingAds, function(idx, adWatcher) {
                adWatcher.enable();
            });
            me.loadAds();
        }
    };
    
    proto.close = function() {
        var me = this,
            UI = this.UI;
        
        if( me.isOpen ){
            jqNeedsScrollPadding.css('padding-right', '');
            jqHtml.removeClass('noscroll');
            UI.homestream.stop(true).slideUp();
            UI.icon.removeClass('open');
            UI.list.find('li').addClass('read');
            UI.listCount.text('');
            
            // cleanup event listeners
            UI.clickClosable.unbind('click', me._closeHandler);
            UI.touchImmovable.unbind('touchmove', me._moveHandler);
            me.isOpen = false;

            $.each(UI.waitingAds, function(idx, adWatcher) {
                adWatcher.disable();
            });
            me.resetStates();
        }
    };

    // source: https://www.npmjs.com/package/measure-scrollbar
    var measureScrollbar = function () {
        var div = document.createElement('div');

        div.style.width = '100px';
        div.style.height = '100px';
        div.style.overflow = 'scroll';
        div.style.position = 'absolute';
        div.style.top = '-9999px';

        document.body.appendChild(div);

        var barWidth = div.offsetWidth - div.clientWidth;

        document.body.removeChild(div);

        return barWidth;
    };

    var AdWatcher = function( modAd, jqWindow, callback ){
        var self = this;
        self.modAd = modAd;
        
        var waypoint = new Waypoint.Inview({
            element: modAd,
            enter: function() {
                callback( self );
            },
            enabled: false,
            context: jqWindow.get(0)
        });
        self.waypoint = waypoint;
        
        self.enable = function(){
            waypoint.enable();
        };
        self.disable = function(){
            waypoint.disable();
        };
        self.destroy = function(){
            waypoint.destroy();
            waypoint = null;
        };
        self.refresh = function(){
            // refresh inner inview waypoints
            if( waypoint.waypoints && waypoint.waypoints.length ) {
                var ways = waypoint.waypoints,
                    i = ways.length;
                while(i--){
                   ways[i].context.refresh();
                }
            }  
        };
    };
    
    var config = {
        source: 'C_HOMESTREAM_SOURCE_AUTOFLOW',
        groupId: 12333162,
        companyId: 10155,
        interval: 0,
        adInterval: 10,
        interstitialAdConfig: '{"adUnitPath":"Orlando_TV/wftv_web_default/weather","contentId":"","isCompanion":false,"lazyLoad":"scroll","isOOP":false,"keywords":"severe weather,orlando,weather,landing","networkID":"12523293","pageUrl":"http%3A%2F%2Fwww.wftv.com%2Fweather","pgType":"subindex","pgId": "12384727","refreshOnResize":false,"siteKey":"","size":[[320, 50]],"sizeMapping":[],"targetting":{"ad_slot":["HS01"]},"wxTargeting":{"skycond":"","weather":"", "temp":""}}'
    };
    var nh = new NavigationHomestream(config);
    EP.Clients.CMG = EP.Clients.CMG || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.navigationHomestream = EP.Clients.CMG.navigationHomestream || [];
    EP.Clients.CMG.navigationHomestream.push(nh);
    nh.start();
})(jQuery);
</script>

    janrain.settings.capture.flowVersion = 'HEAD';

    // --- Backplane ------------------------------------------------------
    janrain.settings.capture.backplane = true;

 // --- Federate --------------------------------------------------------
 janrain.settings.capture.federate = true;
 janrain.settings.capture.federateServer = 'https://sso.cmgdigital.com';
 janrain.settings.capture.federateXdReceiver = 'http://' + 'www.wftv.com' + '/auth/xdreceiver';

    // --- Load URLs -----------------------------------------------------------

    var httpsLoadUrl = 'https://rpxnow.com/load/cmg-dev';

    // --- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE -----------------------------------------

    function isReady() { janrain.ready = true; };

    }

    var e = document.createElement('script');
    e.type = 'text/javascript';
    e.id = 'janrainAuthWidget';
    if (document.location.protocol === 'https:') {
        e.src = httpsLoadUrl;
    } else {
        e.src = httpLoadUrl;
    }
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(e, s);
    

    
})();

function janrainReturnExperience() {
    var span = document.getElementById('traditionalWelcomeName');
    var name = janrain.capture.ui.getReturnExperienceData("displayName");
    if (span && name) {
        span.innerHTML = "Welcome back, " + name + "!";
    }
}

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
/* --- page-specific settings ------------------------------------------ */
 var janrain_css_file = $(".janrain_css_file").text();
 var janrain_cmgclean_css_file = janrain_css_file + '/janrain_css/cmgclean.css';
 janrain.settings.capture.flowName = 'standard_television';
 janrain.settings.capture.stylesheets = [janrain_cmgclean_css_file];
 
 var currentSiteUrl = document.location.href;
 var currentResult = currentSiteUrl.match("verification_code");
 if (currentResult) {
  janrain.settings.type = 'embed';
  janrain.settings.capture.screenToRender = 'verifyEmail';
 } else {
  janrain.settings.capture.recaptchaPublicKey = '6LeVKb4SAAAAAGv-hg5i6gtiOV4XrLuCDsJOnYoP';
  janrain.settings.capture.setProfileData = '';
  janrain.settings.capture.confirmModalClose = '';
 }

 /* --- define event handlers and start the janrain ui ------------------ */
 function janrainCaptureWidgetOnLoad() {
  if (janrain.capture.ui.hasActiveSession() == false) {
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = 'none';
  }
 
     janrain.events.onCaptureLoginSuccess.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (currentSiteUrl.match('/auth/login')) {
                var sp = document.location.href.split('next=');
                if (sp.length == 2){
                    window.location = '' + '/' + sp[1].split('&')[0];
                }
            }
            janrain.capture.ui.modal.close();
            if (window.console && window.console.log) console.log(result);
        
   var captureProfileLink = document.getElementById("captureProfileLink");
  
            captureProfileLink.innerHTML = result.userData.displayName;
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = '';
            captureProfileLink.style.display = '';
   
            if (result.action != 'ssoSignin' && !EP.Clients.CMG.Util.noRedirectOnJanrainLogin) 
                window.location = captureProfileLink.attributes.href.value;
     });

     janrain.events.onCaptureSessionFound.addHandler(function(result) {
            janrain.capture.ui.modal.close();
            if (window.console && window.console.log) console.log(result);
            
            if (localStorage.getItem('janrainCaptureProfileData')) {
                var profileData = localStorage.getItem('janrainCaptureProfileData');
                profileData = typeof profileData == "string" ? JSON.parse(profileData) : profileData;
                document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").innerHTML = profileData.displayName;
            }
        
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = '';
     });

     janrain.events.onCaptureRegistrationSuccess.addHandler(function(result) {
            janrain.capture.ui.modal.close();
            if (window.console && window.console.log) console.log(result);
        
            if (result && result.userData && result.userData.displayName) {
                document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").innerHTML = result.userData.displayName;
            }
            document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = '';
            document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = 'none';
     });
  
  janrain.events.onCaptureModalReady.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (currentSiteUrl.match('/auth/login')) {
                janrain.capture.ui.modal.open('signIn');
            }
  });
  
  janrain.events.onModalClose.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (janrain.capture.ui.hasActiveSession() == true) {
                document.getElementById("captureSignInLink").style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById("captureRegisterLink").style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById("captureSignOutLink").style.display = '';
                document.getElementById("captureProfileLink").style.display = '';
            }
     });
  
  janrain.events.onCaptureEmailVerificationSuccess.addHandler(function(result){
            console.log('onCaptureEmailVerificationSuccess', result);
            if(result.userData && result.userData.registrationUrl) {
                window.location = result.userData.registrationUrl;
            }
     });
  
     janrain.events.onCaptureSessionEnded.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (window.location.pathname === '/edit-profile') {
                window.location = '/home';
            } else {
                window.location.reload();
            }
     });

     janrain.events.onCaptureScreenShow.addHandler(function(result) {
            if (result.screen == "returnTraditional") {
                janrainReturnExperience();
            }
     });
        
        janrain.capture.ui.registerFunction('emailValidation', function(name, value, validation) {
            var verifyEmail = function(email, verifyUnique) {
                $.ajax({
                    type: 'GET',
                    url: '/cmg-thirdparty-portlet/restful/janrain/api/verifyEmail',
                    data: {
                        'groupId': '12333162',
                        'companyId': '10155',
                        'email': email,
                        'verifyUnique': verifyUnique
                    },
                    success: function(data) {
                        if (data.emailValidation == 'false') {
                            if (data.errors === 'invalid') {
                                validation.notValid('Please enter a valid email address.');
                            } else if (data.errors === 'duplicate') {
                                validation.notValid('Email address is already being used.');
                            }
                        } else {
                            validation.valid();
                        }
                    }
                });
            };
            switch(name) {
                case 'traditionalSignIn_emailAddress': 
                    verifyEmail(value, false);
                    break;
                case 'traditionalRegistration_emailAddress':
                    verifyEmail(value, true);
                    break;
                case 'email':
                    if (membercenter && membercenter.sdk) {
                        membercenter.sdk.getUserProfile().then(function(profile) {
                            if (profile.email == value) {
                                validation.valid();
                            } else {
                                verifyEmail(value, true);
                            }
                        });
                    }
                    break;
            }
        });
        janrain.capture.ui.registerFunction('displayNameValidation', function(name, value, validation) {
            var displayNameRegex = /^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$/;
            if (displayNameRegex.test(value)) {
                var whitespace = /\s/;
                if (whitespace.test(value)) {
                    //console.log("displayNameValidation false");
                    return false;
                } else {
                    //console.log("displayNameValidation true");
                    return true;
                }
            } else {
                //console.log("displayNameValidation false");
                return false;
            }
        });
        janrain.capture.ui.registerFunction('zipCodeValidation', function(name, value, validation) {
            var zipCodeRegex = /^[0-9]{5}(?:-[0-9]{4})?$/;
            if (zipCodeRegex.test(value)) {
                return true;
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        });
        
     janrain.capture.ui.start();
 }
 
 function janrainWidgetOnload() {
     
        function add_cmg_zip_help(){
            /* add_cmg_zip_help() adds the "question mark" help link after the "POSTAL ZIP"
               label on the register modal. Since the field widgets are dynamically created
               by the janrain js library, the most straightforward way to get the help link
               after the label was to inject it after the janrain js library had rendered the
               fields into the DOM. Also it changes the Janrain field label from "Postal Zip"
               to "Zip Code"
   */
            var d = document.getElementById("capture_traditionalRegistration_form_item_registration_postalZip");
            if (d){
                var modal = document.getElementById("cmg_zip_help_modal");
                var ih = d.innerHTML.replace(/\*Postal Zip/, "Zip Code").replace(/Postal Zip/, "Zip Code");
                var ins_html = ' <a id="cmg_zip_help" href="javascript://">?</a>';
                var chunks = ih.split("</label>");
                d.innerHTML = chunks[0] + ins_html + chunks[1];
                document.getElementById("cmg_zip_help").addEventListener("click", function(){
                    var modal = document.getElementById("cmg_zip_help_modal");
                    var rect = document.getElementById("janrainModal").getBoundingClientRect();
                    modal.style.left = rect.left + 10 + 'px';
                    modal.style.display = 'block';
                });
                document.getElementById('cmg_zip_help_modal'). querySelectorAll('.janrain_modal_closebutton')[0].addEventListener("click", function(){
                    modal.style.display = 'none';
                });
                var nodes_csa = document.querySelectorAll("#capture_traditionalRegistration_form_item_registration_birthday .capture_select_arrow");
            }
            
        }                    


        function reposition_janrain_modal(){
            var h = document.getElementById("header");
            var m = document.getElementById("janrainModal");
            m.style.top = m.offsetTop + h.offsetHeight + 40 + 'px';
            m.style.height = m.offsetHeight + 10 + 'px';
        }

        janrain.events.onCaptureRenderComplete.addHandler(function(){
            add_cmg_zip_help();
            setTimeout(reposition_janrain_modal, 200);
        });
    
 }
</script>

        anvp.pHeaderPlayer.config.url = "http://www.nielseninternet.com/VOD/NielsenConsumer/prog_index.m3u8";
    }

    function getParameterByName(name, url) {
        name = name.replace(/[\[]/, "\\\[").replace(/[\]]/, "\\\]");
        var regexS = "[\\?&]" + name + "=([^&#]*)";
        var regex = new RegExp(regexS);
        var results = regex.exec(url || window.location.search);
        if (results == null)
            return null;
        else
            return decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, " "));
    }

<script type="text/javascript">
        (function(){
            var epIconMaximizeIconClick = function (popupStreamUrl) {
                var width = 530;
                var height = 404;
                var leftPosition, topPosition;
                leftPosition = window.screen.width - width;
                topPosition = window.screen.height - height - ((window.screen.height -height) / 3);
                window.open(popupStreamUrl, "Window2",
                "status=no,height=" + height + ",width=" + width + ",resizable=yes,left="
                + leftPosition + ",top=" + topPosition + ",toolbar=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=yes,location=no,directories=no");
                var playerList = anvp.getAll();
                for (var index in playerList){
                    var playerid = playerList[index];
                    (function(playerid){
                        anvp[playerid].getState(function(state){
                            if(state == "playing" || state == "loading" || state == "buffering") {
                                anvp[playerid].pause();
                            }
                        });
                    })(playerid);
                };
            }
        
            var maximizeIconOnClick = function(){
                epIconMaximizeIconClick('/popup-livestream');
                
                var playerList = anvp.getAll();
                for (var index in playerList){
                    var playerid = playerList[index];
                    (function(playerid){
                        anvp[playerid].pause();
                    })(playerid);
                };
            };
        
            var originalListener = anvp.pHeaderPlayer.listener;
            anvp["pHeaderPlayer"].listener = function (e) {
                if(originalListener){
                    originalListener(e);
                }
                switch (e.name) {
                    case "PLAYING_START":
                        $('#ep-icon-maximize-icon').click(maximizeIconOnClick);
                    break;
                    case "USER_PAUSE":
                        setCookie('userPaused', true, 30);
                    break;
                }
            };
            
            var setCookie = function(cname, cvalue, exdays){
                var d = new Date();
                d.setDate(d.getDate() + exdays);
                var expires = "expires=" + d.toGMTString();
                document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires;
            }
        })();
        </script>

<script>
(function($, A, isIframed){
		
		/* utils */
		var timer,
			gCtx = this,
			setLater = function(timer, delay, ctx, fnt, data, periodic){
				killLater(timer);
				return A.later(delay, ctx, fnt, data, periodic);
			},
			killLater = function(timer){
				if(timer){
					timer.cancel();
				}
				return null;
			};
		
		var init = function(){
			
			/* vars */
			var hideCls = 'hidden',
				showCls = 'show',
				calcCls = 'calculating',
				maxHeight = 41,
				hasMore = false,
				$nav = $('#nav-main'),
				$navList = $nav.find('#main-menu'),
				$navLis = $navList.children('li').not('.'+hideCls),
				$navItems = $navLis.not('.more-link'),
				lastIdx = $navItems.length - 1,
				maxPops = $navLis.length,
				count = 0,
				$moreMenu = $navLis.filter('.more-link').first(),
				$moreMenuList = $moreMenu.find('.sub-menu').first(),
				lastWindowWidth,
				listening = [];

			/* functions */
			var checkNav = function(){
					/* reset */
					$nav.addClass(calcCls);
					$navLis.removeClass(hideCls+' '+showCls);
					$moreMenuList.empty();
					hasMore = false;
					lastIdx = maxPops - 1;
					count = 0;

					if( Modernizr.mq('only screen and (min-width: 768px)') ){
						popHide();
						if( !isIframed ){
							navShowStoryList();
						}
					} else {
						$nav.removeClass(calcCls); 
					}
				},

				asyncCheckNav = function(){
					/* Kills other operations waiting with this timer to avoid recursion */
					timer = setLater(timer, 0, gCtx, checkNav); 
				},

				/* If needed, hides the last list item & moves to More menu */
				popHide = function(){
					
					if( count < maxPops && $navList.innerHeight() > maxHeight ){
						var $item = $navItems.eq(lastIdx),
						$clone = $('<li />').append( $item.children('a').clone().removeClass('dropdown-toggle') );
						lastIdx--;
						$item.addClass(hideCls);
						
						$moreMenuList.prepend( $clone );
						if( !hasMore ){
							hasMore = true;
							$moreMenu.addClass(showCls);
						}
						count++;
						/* Call popHide to re-measure */
						timer = setLater(timer, 0, gCtx, popHide); 
					} else {
						/* Done calculating */
						$nav.removeClass(calcCls);
					}
				},
			navShowStoryList = function(){
				var loaded = {};
				for(var i = 0 ; i < lastIdx ; i++) {
					var dropdownContainerCls = 'dropdown-container';
						
					var updateTruncation = function( $container ){
						setLater(null, 250, this, function(){
							EP.Clients.CMG.Util.dotdotdot.add( $container, true );
						});
					};
						
					var $navCont = $navItems.eq(i),
						navEl = $navCont.get(0);
					if( $.inArray(navEl, listening)===-1 ){
						listening.push( navEl );
						$navCont.mouseenter(function(){
							var ajaxUrl = $("#main-menu").attr('ajaxurl');
							var navItem = $(this);
							var navID = navItem.attr('id');
							if( !navID ){
								navID = A.guid('nav-');
								navItem.attr('id', navID);
							}
							
							if (!loaded[navID]) {
								loaded[navID] = true;
								ajaxUrl = ajaxUrl + $("#" + navID).children("span").text();
								$.ajax({
									type: "GET",
									url: ajaxUrl,
								}).done(function(html) {
									if( html && html.indexOf('carousel-wrapper')!==-1){
										
										var dropdownContainer = navItem.find('.'+dropdownContainerCls);
										if( !dropdownContainer.length ){
											navItem.append('<div class="dropdown-menu"><div class="' + dropdownContainerCls + '"></div></div>');
											dropdownContainer = navItem.find('.'+dropdownContainerCls);
										}
										dropdownContainer.append(html.trim());
										A.use('ep-carousel', function(){
											/* Wait for carousel */
											updateTruncation( dropdownContainer );
										});
									}
								})
							} else {
								updateTruncation( navItem.find('.'+dropdownContainerCls) );
							}
							
						});
					}
				}
			};
			
				
			
			var $win = $(window).resize(function(e){
				var wd = $win.width();
				if(wd !== lastWindowWidth){
					/* Only update if there really was a change */
					lastWindowWidth = wd;
					asyncCheckNav();
				}
			});
			checkNav();
		};
		timer = setLater(timer, 10, gCtx, init);
	 })(jQuery, AUI(), false);
</script>

<script>
(function($, modId){
	EP = EP || {};
    EP.Clients = EP.Clients || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG = EP.Clients.CMG || {};
    var CMG = EP.Clients.CMG;
	CMG.Util = CMG.Util || {};
	CMG.Util.story = CMG.Util.story || {};
	/* Waits for DOM manipulation to be complete */
	EP.Clients.CMG.Util.story[modId] = function(callback){
		var getMod = function(){
			return $('#'+modId);
		},
		mod = getMod(),
		ready = 'story-ready',
		checkForModReady = function( md ){
			if(!md.hasClass(ready)){
				md.one(ready, callback);
			} else {
				callback();
			}
		};
		if( mod.length ){
			checkForModReady(mod);
		} else {
			$(document).ready(function() {
				checkForModReady(getMod());
			});
		}
	};
})( jQuery, "story_271402956_153903" );
</script>
<script>
(function() {
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA || {};
    if (EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.initialized !== true) {
    
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.carousels = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.carousels || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.players = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.players || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.videoPlayingIndexes = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.videoPlayingIndexes || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util = EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util || {};
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.applySlideClasses = function(slides, idx, done) {
        var key = idx+'';
        if( !done[key] ){
            var dis = this;
            var cs = 'placeholder-16x9';
            slides.eq(idx).find('.'+cs).each(function(i, el) {
                var $el = $(el);
                var src = $el.attr('data-src');
                var strip = function(){
                    $el.removeClass(cs);
                };
                if(src && $.trim(src)!==''){
                    /* Preload */
                    $('<img/>').load(function () {
                        $(this).remove(); /* prevent memory leaks */
                        strip();
                    }).attr('src', src);
                    /* Backup */
                    A.later(1500, dis, strip);
                } else {
                    strip();
                }
            });
            done[key] = true;
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.slidePreviousClicked = function(model, e) {
        var carousel = $(e.target).parents('.carousel-mixed-media, .carousel-gallery-inline'),
            adContainer = carousel.find('.mixed-media-carousel-ad');
        if (carousel.length > 0 && adContainer.length > 0 && adContainer.css('display') === 'block') {
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD(adContainer);
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carousel.attr('id')]++;
        } else {
            if (model.hasPrevious()) {
                model.previous();
            } else {
                model.selectedIndex(model.totalSlides());
            }
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.slideNextClicked = function(model, e) {
        var carousel = $(e.target).parents('.carousel-mixed-media, .carousel-gallery-inline'),
            adContainer = carousel.find('.mixed-media-carousel-ad');
        if (carousel.length > 0 && adContainer.length > 0 && adContainer.css('display') === 'block') {
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD(adContainer);
            EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carousel.attr('id')]++;
        } else {
            if (model.hasNext()) {
                model.next();
            } else {
                model.selectedIndex(0);
            }
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.refreshInterstitialAD = function(carouselId) {
        var adContainer = $('#' + carouselId + ' .mixed-media-carousel-ad');
        if (adContainer && adContainer.length > 0) {
            if (5 && EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carouselId] === 5) {
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.displayInterstitialAD(adContainer);
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carouselId] = 0;
            } else {
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD(adContainer);
                EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.slideCounters[carouselId]++;
            }
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.displayInterstitialAD = function(adContainer) {
        var adWrapper = adContainer.find('.mod-wrapper.mod-ad');
        if (adWrapper.length > 0 && adWrapper.data('ad-json')) {
            var adSlot = adWrapper.find('.ep-ad-slot');
            if (adSlot.length > 0 && EP.Utils.AdUtils.ads[adSlot.attr('id')]) {
                EP.Utils.AdUtils.refreshAdWithGptAdSlot(EP.Utils.AdUtils.ads[adSlot.attr('id')].slot);
            } else {
                var adConfigJson = adWrapper.data('ad-json');
                if (adConfigJson && adConfigJson.targetting && adConfigJson.targetting.ad_slot) {
                    EP.Utils.AdUtils.createIncrementingContent(adConfigJson, adWrapper, "append");
                    adWrapper.find('.ep-ad-slot').attr('name', adConfigJson.targetting.ad_slot[0]);
                }
            }
            adContainer.css('display', 'block');
            adContainer.parent('.slides-wrapper').addClass('interstitial-ad-shown');
        }
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.hideInterstitialAD = function(adContainer) {
        adContainer.css('display', 'none');
        adContainer.parent('.slides-wrapper').removeClass('interstitial-ad-shown');
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.refreshThumbsAfterCarouselSwipped = function(currentIdx, thumbs, thumbsContainer) {
        var scrollX = 0;
        thumbs.each(function(index, li) {
            var $li = $(li);
            if(index < currentIdx) {
                scrollX += $li.outerWidth(true);
            }
        });
        thumbsContainer.stop(true).animate({
            scrollLeft: scrollX
        }, "slow");
    };
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.Util.bindThumbArrowsInteraction = function(carousel, thumbsContainer) {
        carousel.find('.thumb-pagination .btn-pager.prev').click(function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
            thumbsContainer.animate({
                scrollLeft: "-=" + thumbsContainer.width() / 2
            }, "slow");
        });
        carousel.find('.thumb-pagination .btn-pager.next').click(function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
            thumbsContainer.animate({
                scrollLeft: "+=" + thumbsContainer.width() / 2
            }, "slow");
        });
    };
    
    }
    
    EP.Clients.CMG.MIXEDMEDIA.initialized = true;
})();
</script>
<section class="mod-wrapper mod-story article-redesign with-headlines mod-story-mixed-media-carousel" id="story_271402956_153903">
<header class="mod-header">
<h1 class="headline">Boil water advisory for some Toho Water Auth. users</h1>
            	        			Updated: <time datetime="2013-01-29">Jan 29, 2013 - 6:35 PM</time>
</header>
<div class="mod-body story-body">
